abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, during conference at City Hall, concedes mistakes made during his tenure and says he wants to do better; also pledges to make more New Yorkers aware of his administration's successes.
lead_paragraph: Halfway into his four-year term, Mayor Bill de Blasio cited some victories but said that leading 8.5 million New Yorkers had proved to be a bigger challenge than he expected.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Concedes Mistakes and Says, ‘I Want to Do Better’
headline.print_headline: Halfway Through Term, de Blasio Concedes Mistakes and Says, ‘I Want to Do Better’

snippet: Halfway into his four-year term, Mayor Bill de Blasio cited some victories but said that leading 8.5 million New Yorkers had proved to be a bigger challenge than he expected.
